seller_description: Experience the perfect blend of style, comfort, and performance with Moonwalkr Cricket Batting Pads, crafted from premium Polypropylene (PP) for exceptional durability and impact resistance. Weighing just 840 grams, these lightweight leg guards ensure unmatched flexibility, allowing effortless movement between wickets while absorbing impacts up to 100 mph. Designed with a sleek, bold look, they offer a customizable fit through softer straps for maximum comfort, enabling you to focus entirely on your game. Available in Medium (5’4” - 5’8”) and Large (5’9” - 6’2”) sizes, these unisex pads cater to teens and adults, making them a dependable choice for modern cricketers. Trusted by professionals, Moonwalkr Leg Guards 2.0, manufactured by 21G Design Works Pvt Ltd, come with a 1-year warranty against manufacturing defects, combining innovation, style, and functionality for a superior cricketing experience.
review: The Leg guard is Extreme light amd comfy to wear. liked it very much
